title: VR-Based Expert Training Course in Mining Safety

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic mining safety protocols and equipment operation experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid education combining hands-on VR training modules with theoretical knowledge, utilizing content simulating real mining environments

learning_goals: In VR environments, learners analyze virtual mining disaster scenarios and perform safety response procedures with over 90% accuracy
Learners identify five major risk factors (collapses, gas leaks, fires, etc.) in mining workplaces and explain preventive strategies
Through team-based projects, learners design and evaluate VR training modules to improve mining safety protocols
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
